lead_paragraph: The United States might having been hosting Copa America for the first time but a legion of Colombia fans brought a distinct flavor of South America to a sweltering Levi's Stadium for the tournament opener on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Copa America California Style Retains a Flavor of South America
headline.main: Copa America California Style Retains a Flavor of South America

snippet: The United States might having been hosting Copa America for the first time but a legion of Colombia fans brought a distinct flavor of South America to a sweltering Levi's Stadium for the tournament opener on Friday....
